title: Proactive Agent State Externalization

problem.en: Models like Sonnet 4.5 proactively write notes to files, but self-generated notes are often incomplete or miss crucial context.
problem.ko: Sonnet 4.5 같은 모델이 능동적으로 파일에 노트를 작성하지만, 자체 생성된 노트는 종종 불완전하거나 중요한 맥락을 놓칩니다.

solution.en: Implement structured approaches to guide and validate the model's natural tendency toward state externalization.
solution.ko: 모델의 상태 외부화에 대한 자연스러운 경향을 안내하고 검증하는 구조화된 접근 방식을 구현합니다.

mermaid_diagram:
flowchart TD
    A[Agent Working] --> B[Guided Note Template]
    B --> C[Write Progress Notes]
    C --> D{Notes Complete?}
    D -->|No| E[Prompt for Missing Info]
    E --> C
    D -->|Yes| F[Continue Work]
code_example:
# Provide template for agent notes
note_template = '''
## Current Objective
{objective}

## Progress Summary
- Completed: ...
- In Progress: ...
- Next: ...

## Knowledge Gaps
- Unknown: ...
- Need Clarification: ...
'''

# Validate completeness
def validate_notes(notes):
    required = ['Objective', 'Progress', 'Gaps']
    return all(section in notes for section in required)
